description.value: FluidConsistencyType : Codes used to represent the consistency of fluids and liquids provided to the patient. This value set includes all the children of SNOMED CT Concepts from SCTID(US Extension): 435681000124103 Dietary liquid consistency diet (regime/therapy) and is provided as a suggestive example
